Text:
Hi Joe, any chance we can get episodes of Coast to coast am as the latest episode is completed rather than a whole bunch at once. I cant get them that way as I dont have a big gig allowance.

Just a thought mate, if not, I understand, no big deal, thanks for what your doing anyway, at least your posting C2Cam...cheers mate
